There is also a _concurrent executor_ ([code link](https://github.com/tensorflow/federated/blob/8c904235dbf00431a95b5b1c64017aecf14517e6/tensorflow_federated/python/core/impl/concurrent_executor.py#L26)) which runs using Python's `asyncio` event loop.
